item.title: Tomcat Server: Building and Deploying Java Web Applications
item.description:
Overview

This project involves setting up a Tomcat server for hosting and deploying a simple Java web application. The server has been installed and configured on my local machine, following this comprehensive guide. The goal is to create a robust pipeline for developing, deploying, and managing Java web applications with automation and multiple environment support.

Current Status

The Tomcat server is up and running on my local machine. Next steps involve creating and deploying a Java web application while planning for scalability and testing in different environments.
